title: Pumpkin Icon?
body:
I sent my friend a gift on October 20th and thought I qualified for the icon. I received the Teemo icon but never received the pumpkin icon. 

Perhaps I didn't qualify for it.

replies.body: Icons for the event are still being distributed to eligible players.  We aim to have that done by the 17th per the [Teemoing ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016)page.  Hang on until then!

Under the Icons/Wards section here    http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016

You can see

*Icons will be granted up to two weeks after November 3, 2016 at 23:59 PT.

So they should still be sending them out.
